item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, January 21, 2025 at 10:15 AM UTC
item.description:

24. Where do those undergraduate divisibility problems come from? (128 points | 40 comments)
25. Show HN: Personalized Duolingo (kind of) for vocabulary building (114 points | 29 comments)
26. ROCm Device Support Wishlist (158 points | 117 comments)
27. X, Facebook, Instagram, and YouTube sign EU code to tackle hate speech (14 points | 13 comments)

29. Zork: The Great Inner Workings (2020) (166 points | 61 comments)
